org.apache.wiki.diff

Class ContextualDiffProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.wiki.diff.ContextualDiffProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiffProvider, WikiProvider

    public class ContextualDiffProvider
extends Object
implements DiffProvider
    A seriously better diff provider, which highlights changes word-by-word using CSS. Suggested by John Volkar.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.apache.wiki.diff.DiffProvider

    • Field Detail

      • PROP_UNCHANGED_CONTEXT_LIMIT

        public static final String PROP_UNCHANGED_CONTEXT_LIMIT
        A jspwiki.properties value to define how many characters are shown around the change context. The current value is "jspwiki.contextualDiffProvider.unchangedContextLimit".

        Description copied from interface: WikiProvider

        public String makeDiffHtml(WikiContext ctx,
                  String wikiOld,
                  String wikiNew)

        Specified by:
